short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hot Jewels is a mind game where the player needs to strategize, think and decide fast and look and match the same colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hot Jewels is a mind game where the player needs to strategize, think and decide fast and look and match the same colors. What it means that this game will keep the player on their toes means that the player needs to concentrate when playing Hot Jewels. The player needs to match at least 3 the same colored jewel and much better if more than 3 because this will greatly affect the game the player is playing.
